column5: This 3350 sqft home is located just 35 minutes from NRG stadium and is Super Bowl LI ready for you and up to 8 guests. Just minutes from luxury shopping, dining, entertainment, grocery stores and more with easy access to 99, I-10, and Westpark Toll Way. Free Wifi, washer and dryer, and backyard grill! Great for corporate groups, business travelers, and families. Crib and pack-and-play available upon request.
column8: Your Super Bowl Home Away From Home
